name: raph-ai-starter-monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist

description: A modern full-stack starter template with separated frontend and backend architectures
author: Raph AI Starter
